headers.value: default-src 'self' https://www.gstatic.com https://*.firebaseapp.com https://dexscreener.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.gstatic.com https://*.firebaseapp.com https://www.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.cloudfunctions.net https://api.dexscreener.com
